title: Reluctant warriors - 1939
brief_description: A summary of events in Britain in 1939 at the beginning of World War II, including the dramatic radio announcement of the declaration of war, evacuation of children from the cities, landing of the British Expeditionary Force in France and the actual beginning of the War at sea. Narrated by Sir Michael Redgrave. Written by Peter Baylis.
